bioAsHtml: Christophe is a R&D engineer at MFG Labs. Passionate about solving problems he uses types and functional programming to build fast and reliable software. He likes to share with others experience and knowledge (and beer!). He especially focus on giving new comers the keys to feel comfortable with intimidating concepts.

acceptedTalks.title: How to make game in the browser thanks to ScalaJS
Reuniting the familly with Eta: Haskell on the JVM.
